kpi.name: M8006C5

kpi_info.title: EPS Bearer setup failures due to Other reasons
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to Other reasons. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by the eNB to MME. The counter is updated if the failure detected does not match any other failure counter.

kpi.kpi_alias: EPS Bearer setup failures due to Other reasons
